entries.definition: Hugo Marie 1848—1935 Dutch botanist and geneticist
city and port on an inlet of the Mediterranean Sea in northwestern Israel at the foot of Mount Carmel population 265,000
a fore-and-aft rigged boat with one mast and a single jib
to get into one's hands or into one's possession, power, or control: such as
a great number of honeybees emigrating together from a hive in company with a queen to start a new colony elsewhere
any of a genus (Fagus of the family Fagaceae, the beech family) of hardwood trees with smooth gray bark and small edible nuts; also : its wood
a unit of capacity equal to 1/4 gallon or 1/3₂ bushel
to lose the remembrance of : be unable to think of or recall
